ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstepping out of zones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This happened to me even with Fade.  If you cast it too close to the zone border, you will zone across. Aznyin Level 12 Erudite Wizard Current Residence:
ygData.messageBody:
> Anyone else out there who have experienced this:
> I resently practiced my Shadowstep near a zone border, jumping
> everywhere. Suddenly I found myself on the other side of the
> zone border (after the usual load). This happened to me near
> the border to Kerra from Tox.

This happened to me even with Fade. If you cast it too close to the
zone border, you will zone across.

Aznyin
Level 12 Erudite Wizard
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
